title: ConceptMap data model based on HL7 equivalent resource

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/' This is a ConceptMap resource

id.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/string' A sequence of Unicode characters

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Meta' The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Narrative' A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/ResourceList' These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Extension' Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

modifierExtension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Extension' Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

url.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_url.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Identifier' An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

version.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/string' A sequence of Unicode characters

_version.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

name.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/string' A sequence of Unicode characters

_name.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

title.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/string' A sequence of Unicode characters

_title.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

status.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_status.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

_experimental.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

date.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/dateTime' A date, date-time or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month).  If hours and minutes are specified, a time zone SHALL be populated. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth, date and dateTime. Seconds must be provided due to schema type constraints but may be zero-filled and may be ignored.                 Dates SHALL be valid dates.

_date.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

publisher.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/string' A sequence of Unicode characters

_publisher.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

contact.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/ContactDetail' Specifies contact information for a person or organization.

description.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/markdown' A string that may contain Github Flavored Markdown syntax for optional processing by a mark down presentation engine

_description.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

useContext.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/UsageContext' Specifies clinical/business/etc. metadata that can be used to retrieve, index and/or categorize an artifact. This metadata can either be specific to the applicable population (e.g., age category, DRG) or the specific context of care (e.g., venue, care setting, provider of care).

jurisdiction.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

purpose.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/markdown' A string that may contain Github Flavored Markdown syntax for optional processing by a mark down presentation engine

_purpose.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

copyright.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/markdown' A string that may contain Github Flavored Markdown syntax for optional processing by a mark down presentation engine

_copyright.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

sourceUri.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/' Identifier for the source value set that contains the concepts that are being mapped and provides context for the mappings.

_sourceUri.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

sourceCanonical.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/' Identifier for the source value set that contains the concepts that are being mapped and provides context for the mappings.

_sourceCanonical.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

targetUri.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/' The target value set provides context for the mappings. Note that the mapping is made between concepts, not between value sets, but the value set provides important context about how the concept mapping choices are made.

_targetUri.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

targetCanonical.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/' The target value set provides context for the mappings. Note that the mapping is made between concepts, not between value sets, but the value set provides important context about how the concept mapping choices are made.

_targetCanonical.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

group.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/ConceptMap_Group' A statement of relationships from one set of concepts to one or more other concepts - either concepts in code systems, or data element/data element concepts, or classes in class models.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be ConceptMap
